channel.title: Motivation on Flying blind - coding nonsense
channel.description: Recent content in Motivation on Flying blind - coding nonsense

item.title: I tried and failed
item.description: What you learn, when your project fails I am a self-taught developer, as most of us I usually followed tutorials on YoutTube or Udemy. I started (almost) hundreds of projects and never finished any. Ok, I published an app in Mac AppStore, so not that bad… I had a bold/great/ambitious idea, I should join a real-life project, where I have deadlines and have to deliver regularly. The perfect way to improve or … Here I am collecting all the lessons I learned.
